author: Special Correspondent
text:
Having completed restoration of 40 per cent of roads to pre-monsoon condition, the Highways Department will complete all road repair works by January-end.

Over 4,800 km of roads were damaged in the State during the recent floods. The government had granted Rs. 150 crore for the restoration of roads, culverts, causeways and structure works at 119 landslide points.

Of the 143 causeways / culverts taken for restoration, 54 have been completed.

Traffic on the high level submersible bridge on the Kanagammachathiram-Thakkolam Road in Tiruvallur Division will be restored in two days.

The bridge had collapsed on November 24, 2015.
title: Road repair work to be completed by month-end
